description: Coconut milk makes the perfect base for this mixed berry vegan ice cream. Use your favourite berries like strawberries, raspberries and blackberries.
keywords: Ice-cream,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Blueberry,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Plant-based,Raspberry,Sesame free,Strawberry,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Vegan Mixed Berry Ice Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the coconut milk into a large bowl, add the vanilla and 3 tablespoons of agave and mix well.
Place the berries in a bowl, add a tablespoon of agave and blend with an immersion blender.
Pour the coconut mix into an ice cream machine and gradually add the berry mix. Churn until frozen.
